overview: The dog in the neighboring house won't stop barking. Emilio and Susana cannot sleep. Nor can they stop fighting. The barking of both the dog and the couple will lead to the breakup and Emilio wrongly dump his anger, insecurity and sadness. Feeling great guilt, he must face himself and an unsuspected decision.
tagline: Dog that barks, couple that bites
title: Bisho
